0.name: Lift Up
0.description: Lift Up is a mobile application designed for bodybuilding and fitness enthusiasts. Its aim is to optimize your workouts by allowing you to create a personalized program, instantly convert weights and track your BMI.

1.name: Bumble B
1.description: Developed as part of my final year project, Bumble B is a mobile application that controls a small car equipped with an ESP32 module provided by the school.

2.name: Konbini website
2.description: I was responsible for redesigning the homepage of the website. I also contributed to the integration of new features and UX optimization.

3.name: HairSwift
3.description: A project created to explore Go's capabilities. It efficiently manages a hair salon with features like appointment scheduling, employee management, and service tracking.

4.name: Bitjutsu
4.description: This project was designed to practice token integration. It is an application that allows users to edit an image via text prompts, utilizing the Replicate API.

5.name: EcoMap
5.description: This app prototype was created for my final year defense. The application uses a map to display a list of ecology-related events.

6.name: Calculator
6.description: As the name suggests, this is a calculator built with React by following a tutorial. The main goal of this project was to familiarize myself with the framework.

7.name: Tic-tac-toe
7.description: Two players compete by alternately placing "X"s and "O"s on a 3x3 grid. The goal is to line up three identical symbols before your opponent.
